title: Update the Employee Handbook
description: Due to a new state law, HR needs to update the company's paid sick leave policy in the employee handbook.

tasks.description: Draft the new policy language in consultation with the legal department.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR drafts legally compliant language for the new policy.

tasks.description: Update the employee handbook document with the new policy language.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR successfully edits the handbook document.

tasks.description: Publish the updated handbook on the company intranet and send a notification to all employees about the change.
tasks.expected_outcome: HR makes the new handbook available and communicates the update to all staff.
